title: Azir broken may need to be Removed
body: game I just played finished around 11:10am I was trundle with 3.2khp I was only taking about 1500 damage from all champs in a second id die, I think there is a bug with azir doing to much damage. Shaco did about 500 damage to me and azir was about 800 and 3.2k dead. I cant explain it any better sorry but I think something is wrong with the champ.

replies.body:
Depending on what items the Azir bought it could of just been you had a lot more Amour and hardly any Magic Resist. 

Also because you're Trundle and Azir usually buys a Morellonomicon (Reduces Healing) and Void Staff + Sorceress Boots (Magic Penetration)
